overview: Ken, Gil, Hezzie and Gabe are members of the Country & Western band 'The Hoosier Hotshots'. They get involved with the beautiful Margie MacGregor, the scheming villain Pamela Trent and horse races. The Hoosier Hotshots discover that a horse will trot like a champion only when he hears a march played on a washboard.
tagline: SWEEPING THE FIELD WITH ACTION MUSICAL THRILLS!
title: The Arkansas Swing
